title: Design-Based Learning for Intergenerational Climate Change Research Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners assume the role of researchers, experiencing intergenerational learning environments through VR simulations and iteratively improving the process of data collection, analysis, and result derivation.

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement a mixed-methods research approach (quantitative + qualitative) to evaluate climate change education effectiveness.
Learners improve intergenerational learning strategies by applying the 4-stage Design-Based Research (DBR) cycle: exploration-design-implementation-evaluation
Learners analyze data collected from VR simulation environments to derive factors influencing parents' sustainable behavior change
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
